articles.title: Qutub Minar Illuminates In Remembrance Of Rwanda Genocide Of 1994 - NDTV
articles.description: The Qutub Minar was lit up with the colours of the Rwandan national flag on Sunday in solidarity with the people of the east-African nation in remembrance of the 100-day massacre that claimed the lives of 800,000 people in 1994.
articles.content:
